# About

As our last event before the summer we would be happy if you join us for some drinks and networking at Summer Stage at Donaukanal. It would be a great opportunity to get to know each other or simply catch up, and also to let us know if you have any input for how we continue with *R-Ladies Vienna*.

Next events will then resume after the summer!
